name: Through the multiverse
description:
Through the multiverse

Through the multiverse is a rogue-like game where you'll have to exterminate glitches that endangare different dimensions and hinder your adventures, but be prepared, this strange glitches somehow affect your weapon and portals makeing them super unpredictable(or shall I say UNSTABLE *wink*).

Genre:

rogue-like, adventure

Controls:

WASD - movement

LMB - punch/shoot

Our team

@margulic - 2D artist, animation

@davitta - 2D artist

@grapemoon - tech artist, level design, project manager

@KILLRyusha  - programming, level design

@water_otter - team lead, game design
